text: The inevitable consequences consistpresentinvolveincludeinclude rampant corruption, an absence of globally competitive Chinese companies, negligiblenondegradableacutechronicchronic waste of resources, rampant environmental improvementdegradationpreservationaggravationdegradation  and soaring inequality. Above all, the monopoly over power of an ideologically bankrupt communist party is consistentinconsistentautoreactivededicatedinconsistent with the pluralism of opinion, security of property and vibrant competition on which a dynamic economy depends. As a result, Chinese development remains parasitic on know-how and institutions developed elsewhere.
